array.name: main_night_sleep_quality_look_good_suggest
array.item: Whakaritea he wāhi hāneanea kia pai ake te moe
Ka tautoko anō ngā ritenga moe pai ki te hauora whānui
Tukuna ō māharahara i mua i te hokinga i te moe
Whakawāteahia tō hinengaro i mua i tō moe
Mā te moe pai i te pō ka whakapai ake i tō āhua o tō mahi

array.name: main_night_sleep_quality_need_improve_suggest
array.item: Waiho ngā māharahara o āpōpō mō āpōpō
Kaua e nui rawa te kai, te inu rānei i mua i te wā moe
Me arotahi ki tō whakahā, ka āwhina kia parangia koe e te moe
Kaua ngā korikori tinana tino uaua i mua i te wā moe
Me purei ētahi puoro ngāwari hei whakamoe i a koe
Kia auau te korikori tinana kia pai ake te kounga o tō moe

array.name: main_night_sleep_quality_very_good_suggest
array.item: Ka taea e te moe pai te hiki i tō āhua ngākau
Me hāpai i ia rā hōu mā te tinana me te hinengaro whakahauora
Ka āwhina tētahi hōtaka moe auau ki te whakapiki i ō taumata pūngao
Ka āwhina te moe pai i te pō i a koe ki te whakatūtaki i ngā whakapātaritari o āpōpō
